text: Echinosaura brachycephala is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Echinosaura Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 2004 Category:Taxa named by Gunther Köhler Category:Taxa named by Wolfgang Böhme (herpetologist) Category:Taxa named by Andreas Schmitz
title: Echinosaura brachycephala
